name: 專題討論（三）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)、輔系修習  ◎限碩二修習 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: The objectives of this course are to provide graduate students with the knowledge and understanding of recent development and research trends in the field of earth sciences.
syllabus:
Objectives:  
Earth Science Seminar aims to help students familiar with the emerging issues in Earth Science, engage students in cross disciplinary conversations that explore Earth Science issues by divergent perspectives.

Week 1   Introduction.  
Week 2-12   Presentation to be given by invited speakers and graduate students on earth sciences-related disciplines.  
Week 13-16   Student presentation.

methodologies.note: There will be a two-hour face-to-face speech each week, which is also available online. Details of speaker and topics will be provided by Prof. Lin-Wen Chen, which will be also available on the course website.
Communicate ideas with speakers and students in a succinct and clear manner.

grading.note: Score is graded based on the regulations of the NTNU and Earth Department

prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program) ◎Exclusive for students taking minor within this department   ◎Exclusive for second year of graduate school ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
